hero.title: TradeSense AI
hero.subtitle: Africa's First AI-Powered Prop Firm
hero.description: A next-generation trading platform designed to guide traders of all levels, from beginners to professionals. Combine real-time AI analysis, intelligent tools, and premium education.

features.title: Why Choose TradeSense AI?
features.subtitle: Everything you need to succeed in trading, on a single platform.

ai_assistance.title: AI Assistance
ai_assistance.description: Buy/Sell/Stop signals directly on your screen. Personalized trade plans and real-time risk alerts.

realtime_dashboard.title: Real-Time Dashboard
realtime_dashboard.description: Professional charts with live data. US markets, Crypto, and Casablanca Stock Exchange integrated.

news_hub.title: News Hub
news_hub.description: Real-time financial news, AI-generated market summaries, and economic event alerts.

community.title: Community Zone
community.description: Connect with other traders, share strategies, and learn from community experts.

masterclass.title: MasterClass
masterclass.description: Complete academy with beginner to advanced courses, live webinars, and AI-guided learning paths.

risk_management.title: Risk Management
risk_management.description: Strict protection rules: 5% max daily loss, 10% max total loss. Your capital is protected.

how_it_works.title: How It Works?
how_it_works.subtitle: Three simple steps to become a funded trader

step1.title: Choose a Challenge
step1.description: Select from our Starter, Pro, or Elite plans based on your level and goals.

step2.title: Trade and Learn
step2.description: Use our AI platform to trade on real data and reach the 10% profit target.

step3.title: Get Funded
step3.description: Pass the challenge and access a funded account with real money to trade.

why_choose.title: Why Traders Choose TradeSense AI
reasons: One platform for trading, learning, and community
AI signals and real-time risk alerts
News + social + MasterClass in one interface
Perfect for beginners and experienced traders
Helps you make smarter decisions, faster
why_choose.cta_subtitle: Join thousands of traders who trust TradeSense AI

no_challenge.title: No Active Challenge
no_challenge.description: You must first purchase a challenge to start trading.

pricing.title: Choose Your Challenge
pricing.subtitle: Select the plan that matches your trading goals
